name: Thuja Capital
overview:
Thuja Capital is structured to invest in early stage healthcare (life science) innovations with a focus on biotechnology and medical devices. Thuja Capital is the manager of Thuja Capital Healthcare Fund, a venture capital fund dedicated to life science investments. Thuja Capital Healthcare Fund will specificaily invest in Benelux based start-up and early-stage life science companies. Furthermore, Thuja Capital is the exclusive manager of Alpinvest Partner’s portfolio of early-stage life science companies.

Thuja Capital’s team believes in building and sustaining a close relationship with the management of companies they invest in. By taking an active role, Thuja Capital aims to help these companies to strengthen and grow their businesses. In addition to this, their broad network of advisors and relationships with other private equity firms allows to play a significant role in the realization of strategic objectives and additional fundraising.

funding_round.source_description: The Netherlands, FABPulous Closes First Financing Round
